SEARCH
Package me.yleoft.zAPI.inventory

Class InventoryBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.yleoft.zAPI.inventory.InventoryBuilder
public class InventoryBuilder extends Object
Builder class for creating custom inventories from YAML configuration. Supports dynamic slot allocation, placeholders, and display conditions.

Inventory-level placeholders available to all items:

  • %rows% - Number of rows in the inventory
  • %title% - Title of the inventory (raw string from config)
  • %command% - Command name to open this inventory

These placeholders are automatically available in addition to slot-specific placeholders (%slot%, %currentitem%) and any custom global placeholders provided.

    • InventoryBuilder

      public InventoryBuilder(@NotNull @NotNull net.kyori.adventure.text.Component title, int rows)
      Creates an inventory builder with a custom title and row count.
      Parameters:
      title - The inventory title
      rows - The number of rows (1-6)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if rows is not between 1 and 6

    • InventoryBuilder

      Creates an inventory builder from a YAML configuration.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to resolve placeholders for (can be null)
      config - The YAML configuration

    • InventoryBuilder

      public InventoryBuilder(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration config)
      Creates an inventory builder from a YAML configuration without player context.

    • InventoryBuilder

      public InventoryBuilder(@Nullable @Nullable org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration config, @NotNull @NotNull Map<String,String> globalPlaceholders)
      Creates an inventory builder from a YAML configuration with custom global placeholders. These placeholders will be applied to ALL items in the inventory, including title.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to resolve placeholders for (can be null)
      config - The YAML configuration
      globalPlaceholders - Custom placeholders to apply globally (e.g., %targetplayer%, %page%)

  • Method Details

    • registerMenuCommand

      public static void registerMenuCommand(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration config)
      Loads and registers a menu command from configuration. If the config contains a "command" key, it creates and registers a command that opens the inventory when executed.
